name: Church Runner
description:
Church Runner is complete game about running to the end of the level and jumping through obstacles to get more time. You can win or you can loose and there is only 1 level!

Keys or Joypad: 

      W/A/S/D/Space
      or Gamepad/Controller D-Pad + X. 
      ("X" means button 1 on the GamePad)

Youtube DevLog: 

      https://youtu.be/YTu1Zsid7Yc 

Credits for the music used in-game:

      - SFX: Retro game SFX made by Murkje

      - Music: New 8 Bits Era by Potatoes Sound

 Created by: 

      Osvath Boros Robert

I've made this just to challenge myself to create something from start to finish. It's just an experimental, extremely simple endless runner type and it took about 1 month to complete. 

I am looking for feedback and ideas to improve it just as a learning experience - you would be making a solid contribution to a developer who is at the beginning of a wannabe indie game developer journey.

 And of course I feel I should to mention that "No, I have not quit my dayjob just yet." 

Thank you all in advance.
